Title: Google OAuth2
Description: Google OAuth2 is a small library that uses the WebBrowser control in order to do simple authentication with a Google account.
HomeWiki:
Google OAuth2
Google OAuth2 is a small library that uses the WebBrowser control in order to do simple authentication with a Google account.


Features
  • Login with Google account
  • Get user info(id, name, email)

Download Google OAuth2 from CodePlex or install using NuGet
